15111.name: @sposhe/voronoi
15111.description:
Voronoi

Generate a Voronoi diagram from a single frame containing one or more ellipses.


How To Use

  1. Create a frame
  2. Add ellipses to the frame (the size of the ellipses doesn't matter—just make sure they're visible)
  3. Select the frame
  4. Run the plugin with the frame selected
  5. A new frame containing vector Voronoi cells is non-destructively generated beside the source frame


How It Works

The plugin uses the X and Y position of the ellipses as the input nodes for creating the Voronoi cells. The cell bounds are calculated using the d3-delaunay library. The plugin creates a new frame beside the source frame, and draws each cell into it as a vector shape.
15111.release_notes: Group and name cell vectors, and add resizing constraints

15261.name: FillTableCells
15261.description:
1. Select cells of one column
  2. Run plugin
  3. Copy Rows from excel (newline as separate value)
  4. Press Fill


Text Position - is index of text in designed cell

14167.name: Fidget Export
14167.description: Fidget - A cross platform UI library for nim. Just take your designs and term them into code!

14880.name: Pong
14880.description: Unwind by playing a classic game of Pong, right in your Figma documents!

14827.name: PageFlow
14827.description:
Standardize the pages your team uses in its workflow and create them on demand.


PageFlow is open source. You can contribute at:


https://github.com/rrhyne/pageflow-figma-plugin

14616.name: BeatFlyer Exporter
14616.description:
This plugin exports your artboards layers so that they can be easily and correctly imported into BeatFlyer: https://beatflyer.com


If you export the layers manually yourself you risk to lose their horizontal or vertical position within the whole composition.


This plugin makes also sure that your background fill gets exported as first layer, if available.

15336.name: Indoor Schemes
15336.description:
Create your first own indoor scheme and navigate around your building with no problems.

  1. Build your scheme using simple Figma components
  2. Add its floors, rooms and paths to plugin
  3. Save final data and load it in our web service

Here you can find instruction for using our Indoor Schemes plugin.

Have fun in using our plugin!

14449.name: Export to Kodika No Code App Builder
14449.description:
Export your designs to add Data, connect the Screens and finally release your applications to the App Store.


Copy your designs from Figma and paste them directly into Kodika.io Studio to build your mobile apps with Drag and Drop!

14351.name: Rounded Rectangle (Squircle)
14351.description:
A tiny Figma plugin that just creates a Rounded Rectangle (a.k.a squircle).


For the people that are used to Sketch (using the U shortcut to create a Rounded Rectangle).


Once installed, you can you use this trick to create a keyboard shortcut:

https://twitter.com/DavidWilliames/status/1169053934243069952


I personally recommend Control+U (as CMD+U and Alt+U don't work), but you can set anything you want.

13554.name: Buoy
13554.description: Mange your projects 'built with Buoy' design system.

14472.name: IntelliJ Icons
14472.description: Plugin provides ability to search and insert icons for IntelliJ platform based IDEs. All the icons are listed on the website.

15359.name: autosizetext
15359.description:
When triggered this plugin autosizes text to fit within its textbox. If text it too small it will grow to fit the bounds or if text it too big it will shrink to fit the bounds.


This plugin has three different options to select textboxes to resize.


Full Page- Resizes all textboxes on current page

Selection - Resizes currently selected textboxes

Textbox Names - comma seperated list of textbox names to resize (ex. textbox1,textbox2 with resize textboxes that have names textbox1 and textbox2)


Visit github for more information on how to use the plugin, how to report issues, and how to suggest further improvements.
15359.release_notes: Ability to select specific textboxes to resize from (entire page, selection, named textboxes)

14495.name: Spymaster
14495.description: Use this plugin to generate a 5x5 grid of words that are secretly assigned to either the red or blue team. Spymasters have a separate page where they can view a map of the assigned colors and give clues to their team to guess which words belong to which team.
